member.name: T:VSSDKAddin.Connect
member.summary: The object for implementing an Add-in.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.#ctor
member.summary: Implements the constructor for the Add-in object. Place your initialization code within this method.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.OnConnection(System.Object,Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode,System.Object,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnConnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being loaded.
member.param: Root object of the host application.
Describes how the Add-in is being loaded.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded.
member.param: Describes how the Add-in is being unloaded.
Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.OnAddInsUpdate(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnAddInsUpdate method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification when the collection of Add-ins has changed.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.OnStartupComplete(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnStartupComplete method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application has completed loading.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.OnBeginShutdown(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnBeginShutdown method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application is being unloaded.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.QueryStatus(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatusTextWanted,EnvDTE.vsCommandStatus@,System.Object@)
member.summary: Implements the QueryStatus method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command's availability is updated
member.param: The name of the command to determine state for.
Text that is needed for the command.
The state of the command in the user interface.
Text requested by the neededText parameter.

member.name: M:VSSDKAddin.Connect.Exec(System.String,EnvDTE.vsCommandExecOption,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Implements the Exec method of the IDTCommandTarget interface. This is called when the command is invoked.
member.param: The name of the command to execute.
Describes how the command should be run.
Parameters passed from the caller to the command handler.
Parameters passed from the command handler to the caller.
Informs the caller if the command was handled or not.
